review: Chromecast is so easy to use! I love that I can use phone apps and send to my tv. It's very similar to having all Samsung products.I do not like, however, the limited amount of compatible apps. I guess you have to use it from your computer.
author: dee aih

review: A show stopper was the fact that it is not compatible with my VPN.  Living in Germany, we use a VPN to obtain Netflix, and U.S. internet access.  The Chromecast is incompatible with my router, and therefore is useless to me.  I'm sure it's a good product if you are in the right situation, but not for me.  The literature on its features was sparse at best when you make the decision to purchase it.  Only after receiving the item, and in trying to install/use it did the incompatibility come to light.

review: I am very pleased with this product. I can now watch programs from my phone on my big-screen TV. And it cost about the price of a cable.

review: The best purchase I have ever made! My laptop crashed and I was resorting to watching Netflix on my iPhone..sad story, I know! I decided to purchase the chromecast since it was only $30 and that was way cheaper than replacing a laptop I never used for anything but Netflix or YouTube. I feel like it was a life changer and have basically been using it everyday for hours at a time since I received it around Xmas. Very easy to setup and use.
